name: Finger Dance
description:
Finger Dance starts amazingly fast and you already in the game.

One game = 60 seconds. So, you can play the game anytime when you have a free minute.

This is actually a timekiller, but also a concentration, focus, dance game with а fresh gameplay.

Dance with your fast fingers as on a dancefloor!
Catch a green star as fast as you can! Faster, faster!
Collect different bonuses and avoid tapping wrong cells.

Prove and improve your speed, attention and reaction!
Or just dance to stretch your quick fingers :)

Easy game to learn, but hard to master.
Simple and made with love gameplay.

Great for any age.

And if you like it, please don`t forget to show this game to your friends.
